rule_text: A component action is a type of action that a player can perform during his turn of an action phase.   21.1 Component actions can be found on various game components, including action cards, technology cards, and faction sheets. Each component action is indicated by an 'Action' header.   21.2 To perform a component action, a player reads the action's text and follows the instructions as described.   21.3 A component action cannot be performed if its ability cannot be completely resolved.   21.4 If a component action is canceled, it does not use that player's action.
